org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network

类 NetworkEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.NetworkEnvironment

  • public class NetworkEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
    Network I/O components of each TaskManager instance. The network environment contains the data structures that keep track of all intermediate results and all data exchanges.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private ConnectionManager connectionManager 
      private IOManager.IOMode defaultIOMode 
      private int extraNetworkBuffersPerGate
      Number of extra network buffers to use for each outgoing/incoming gate (result partition/input gate).
      private boolean isShutdown 
      private KvStateClientProxy kvStateProxy
      Proxy for the queryable state client.
      private KvStateRegistry kvStateRegistry
      Registry for InternalKvState instances.
      private KvStateServer kvStateServer
      Server for InternalKvState requests.
      private java.lang.Object lock 
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      private NetworkBufferPool networkBufferPool 
      private int networkBuffersPerChannel
      Number of network buffers to use for each outgoing/incoming channel (subpartition/input channel).
      private int partitionRequestInitialBackoff 
      private int partitionRequestMaxBackoff 
      private ResultPartitionManager resultPartitionManager 
      private TaskEventDispatcher taskEventDispatcher
